title: SICK OF SOLO QUEUE WELL LETS DUO SILVER TO GOLD!
body: Looking for a solo queue buddy to discord and grind some games with Currently silver 5 trying to get gold ty.

replies.body: i can duo S5 support main

I recommend posting a link to your accounts op.gg.  Not doing it is like having a dating profile with no photos, everyone presumes you look like the north end of a southbound camel (or in this case, play mid/jg with ryze/azir and lee/nidalee in silver, with a 36% average winrate, and you need to stop falling into bronze after getting lucky in placements).
